H0.text: A polar bear that has darkâ€‘colored fur has a disadvantage compared to other animals in its population, because some animals have advantages and disadvantages due to their differences.

H1.text: A deer with long legs has a disadvantage compared to other animals in its population because some animals possess advantages and disadvantages due to their differences.

H2.text: A rabbit that can run fast has a disadvantage compared to other animals in its population.

H3.text: A hummingbird with a long beak has a disadvantage compared to other animals in its population.

A4.text: Some animals have dark pigments such as melanin in their skin, eyes and fur to protect themselves against sunburn (damage to living tissues caused by ultraviolet light).
